JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Head of partnerships – You build reseller partnerships for Princh across the world!
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you have a passion and flair for strategic and hands-on
sales and business development? Do you want to be part of a
team where your opinion is valued, and you have real
influence? Do you want to join a highly motivated team and
rapidly growing software company?


If your answer to the above questions is a clear “YES”, then
read on.


Briefly about us:
Princh is a strong player in the sharing economy space with an
innovative solution for cloud document processing and
electronic payment. We’re the leading solution in Northern
Europe and growing fast in North America – and we’re just
getting started!


We are an international team funded by professional
investors fighting to reach our vision: Become the standard
for printing and payment in the public space!


What you’ll be doing:
Your main responsibility is to identify the right reseller
partners for Princh, onboard them and support them in
becoming successful for Princh and themselves.


In collaboration with the management team, you will define
our partnership strategy. You will be responsible for driving
the execution of said strategy.


On a daily basis, you will:

  • Identify relevant partners and initiate dialogues with
    them
  • Onboard the chosen partners and provide the necessary
    training, materials etc. needed for them to become
    successful - quickly.
  • Be in touch with our partners to ensure that we’re on
    track to reach the agreed upon targets.
  • Ensure that we have internal, well-functioning processes and tools for onboarding new partners and providing them with what they need to be successful - quickly.
  • You identify partner product needs and communicate
    them clearly to our Product Owner  

What we ask of you:
You’re curious and confident by nature – yet humble. You have a positive and strong mind and fight hard to achieve your goals.


You have a strategic and analytical mindset, and you clearly articulate your thoughts and ideas to the people around you.


Your high level of empathy allows you to easily relate to our partners and build trust with them.


It’s important to have a good – if not strong –understanding of IT and technology in general.


You probably hold a bachelor’s or master’s degree within a commercial discipline. Previous experience in a hands-on sales role is an advantage. Similarly, experience building partnerships is a plus but not a requirement.


Absolutely full English proficiency is necessary.


What we offer you:
We offer you a unique chance to learn firsthand what it’s like to develop and grow a software company.


Expect to join an informal and pleasant working environment with great conditions for growing as a person and a professional. You will be challenged and supported in continuously enhancing your skills and toolbox.


Process:
We’re looking for just the right person with the right skillset and personality and will be reviewing applications and conducting interviews continuously.

Please visit our Jobs web page and click on the Apply Now button to
submit your application: princh.com/jobs-internships


If you have any questions about the position, our team or mission, feel
free to contact Thomas, our CEO, by phone: +45 21 27 35 50
